name: Polygot Pelican
description:
https://levidsmith.com/games/polygot-pelican/

Help Polygot Pelican eat all of the foreign words matching the English word in the upper left corner.  He must  eat one matching word from each language.  The foreign languages are Spanish, Latin, German, French, Japanese, Russian, Korean, and Italian.  Eating an incorrect word will result in the loss of one life.  Crocodiles will also appear randomly and will also result in the loss of one life if they come into contact with Polygot Pelican.

A bar below the player’s score decreases over time.  Eating the next correct word quickly will result in scoring more points, which range from 200 for fast down to 5 for slow.

There are currently three levels, which each covering a category of words such as Colors, Numbers, and Animals.  Complete all of the stages in a level and you will be able to choose a new level.  The game is completed when all three levels are completed.

The game is over when all lives are lost.  Enter your name to compete in the online leaderboard to prove that you are the ultimate polygot!
